defaultOpen.description: Whether the overlay is open by default (uncontrolled).

onOpenChange.description: Handler that is called when the overlay's open state changes.

drawerProps.description: Props to pass to the drawer when type is 'drawer'.

isDismissable.description: Whether to close the modal when the user interacts outside it.

isKeyboardDismissDisabled.description: Whether pressing the escape key to close the modal should be disabled.

isOpen.description: Whether the overlay is open by default (controlled).

mobileType.description: The type of overlay to display on mobile. Set to null to disable.

modalProps.description: Props to pass to the modal when type is 'modal'.

popoverProps.description: Props to pass to the popover when type is 'popover'.

shouldCloseOnInteractOutside.description:
When user interacts with the argument element outside of the overlay ref,
return true if onClose should be called.  This gives you a chance to filter
out interaction with elements that should not dismiss the overlay.
By default, onClose will always be called on interaction outside the overlay ref.

type.description: The type of overlay to display on desktop.
